text: Ya phir uski misaal aisi hai jaise ek gehre samandar mein andhera , ke upar ek mauj chayi hui hai, uspar ek aur mauj, aur uske upar baadal,tareeki(andhera) par tareeki (darkness) musallat hai, aadmi apna haath nikale to usey bhi na dekhne paye. Jisey Allah noor na bakshay uske liye phir koi noor nahin
